message.content:
{"id": "19089", 
"title": "Popup menu not appearing when right clicking on java editor ruler (Photon)", 
"description": "When using the Photon version, there is an issue with the popup menu not appearing when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in a java editor. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints and marks, but it does not appear as expected.", 
"OB": "1) Open a java editor. \n2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. \nThe menu to add breakpoints and marks should appear, but it does not.", 
"EB": "1) Open a java editor. \n2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. \nThe menu to add breakpoints and marks should appear, but it does not.", 
"SR": "The popup menu should be fixed to ensure it appears as expected when right clicking on the java editor ruler."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '19089', 'title': 'Bug 19089No popup menu java editor ruler (Photon)', 'description': 'Bug 19089No popup menu java editor ruler (Photon) ', 'OB': '1) Open a java editor2) Right click on the left vertical rulerThis should popup a menu to add breakpoints/marks,etc, butit does not. ', 'EB': '1) Open a java editor2) Right click on the left vertical rulerThis should popup a menu to add breakpoints/marks,etc, butit does not. ', 'SR': ''}
